mapper.select: SELECT INFO.PR_CODE,INFO.PR_NAME,INFO.PR_IMG,INFO.PR_BKIND, BCATE.VALUE AS PR_BKIND_VALUE, info.PR_SKIND, SCATE.VALUE AS PR_SKIND_VALUE, info.PR_COUNTRY,info.PR_CITY,info.PR_ALCOHOL,info.PR_PLACE,info.PR_FOOD, info.PR_CONTENT,info.PR_PRICE,info.PR_AMOUNT,info.PR_TOTALCOUNT,info.PR_LIKE, info.PR_USE,info.INSERT_ID,info.INSERT_DAY FROM PRODUCT_INFO INFO INNER JOIN DRINK_CATEGORY BCATE ON info.PR_BKIND = BCATE.CODE INNER JOIN DRINK_CATEGORY SCATE ON info.PR_SKIND = SCATE.CODE WHERE PR_CODE = #{value}
select count(*) from order_info where user_id = #{value}
